body:
I submit online reports quite alot, and more often than not, It gets locked with "This would only warrant a warn."
I then feel really bad and as if I'm wasting moderators time

Question: Should me/the community not report people if they'd only get a warn/kick or should we still do it?
body_tagged:
I submit online reports quite alot, and more often than not, It gets locked with "This would only warrant a warn."
I then feel really bad and as if I'm wasting moderators time

Question: Should me/the community not report people if they'd only get a warn/kick or should we still do it?
title: Question to mods

replies.body:
You're not wasting our time, firstly.

To answer the question; I would report them anyway.
How would you know what is a warn, kick, tempban or a ban (unless you're a staff member).

We look (Well, I do); look at the previous infractions on the player. If we find that they were breaking the rules on numerous occasions, they would be given a lengthy punishment. If I were you, report them anyway :)

replies.body: It shows to look out for the player.
replies.body_tagged: It shows to look out for the player.

replies.body:
I'd go to http://avicus.net/[Person]?tab=infractions 
If it was chat related and they already had a kick or a warn, I'd report it.
